title: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Ad
description: Search Advertising Aggregated Performance Measures By Ad is a collection of aggregated measures pulled from Search Advertising Platforms by Ad/Keyword.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

accountId.title: Account Identifier
accountId.description: Identifier that defines Customer/Client ID setup on the Search Advertising Platform.

campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
campaignId.description: Campaign ID on the search advertising platform..

adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform.

adId.title: Ad Identifier
adId.description: Ad ID on the search advertising platform.

searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

clicks.description: Count of Clicks for a given ad displayed on the network.

impressions.description: Count of impressions for a given ad displayed on the network.

totalCost.description: Total Advertising Spend for a given ad displayed on the network. The spend is in the account currency configured on the network.

avgPosition.description: Average Position of the Ad displayed on the network.

topPageBid.description: Top of the Page Bid Estimator. The measure is computed by the network and is not an additive measure.

qualityScore.description: Quality Score of the Keyword assigned by the network - range 1 to 10. This is not an additive measure.

device.title: Device
device.description: The device from where the ad was displayed.
